mapper.select: select ja.job_application_seq, r.resume_seq, jp.job_posting_seq, ja.application_status, ja.pass_stage, ja.application_date, ja.is_read, r.career_type, r.title, jp.posting_title, jp.corp_no, m.name from JOB_APPLICATION ja join JOB_POSTING jp on ja.job_posting_seq = jp.job_posting_seq join resume r on ja.resume_seq = r.resume_seq join member m on r.email = m.email where jp.corp_no = #{corpNo}
